name: Yummy Cubes
description:
Do you have a CRUSH on puzzle and match 3 games? DOWNLOAD Yummy Cubes and start NOW for FREE! With the tastiest graphics, Yummy Cubes builds a world of yummy candies, cookies and other desserts.

Start your chef career with our awesome game Yummy Cubes! Pop at least two of the same color nearby cubes to meet the tasty goals and complete the levels! Don't forget to use our powerful boosters to POP your way to the TOP!

Awesome features in Yummy Cubes:

- Relaxing, attractive, fun gameplay!
- Tons of amazing levels with challenging goals to achieve!
- Plenty of chapters! Unlock them and discover beautiful background pictures!
- Tons of powerful and yummy boosters: Super Bonbon, Syrup Bombs, Rainbow Candy, Sweet Hammer and more!
- Plenty of FREE Gift Boxes full of super handy yummy rewards!
- With no time limits, you can use your time wisely to find the best moves!
- Available in different languages! Enjoy the fun with players all around the world!
- Invite your family members and friends to send free energy to each other!
- No internet connection? Don’t worry, offline mode is supported. Play Yummy Cubes anywhere, anytime!
- Supported on both iPhone and iPad!

Download NOW! Become the Puzzle Solving King and enjoy Yummy Cubes! Our Master Chef and his little Doggy are waiting to play with you!

Enjoying Yummy Cubes? Meet more friends and learn more about the game on our Facebook Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/yummycubes/

Subscription Info
- Subscribe to the Golden Chef Weekly Membership to unlock the following features in the game:
1) After the 3 days free trial, you will receive 800 coins for your first subscription as an official member!
2) Daily Login Coin Bonus
3) Increase Energy Limits
4) One free booster for playing each level
5) Exclusive Avatar
- Golden Chef Weekly Membership offers $7.99 per week to access the above features.
- Payment will be charged to the applicable iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. The prices may vary depending on country. The actual money charged may also be converted into your local currency based on the iTunes Account policy.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period and you must verify the cost of the renewal.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.
- Any unused portion of a free pass period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.
- Tap “Restore” to restore your plan on your new device!

*Please kindly access to the Privacy Policy at https://zenjoy-res.tuanguwen.com/privacy/zenjoy.html and Terms of Use at https://zenjoy-res.tuanguwen.com/privacy/term.html.
